sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export const FlowerAbout = () => { return (

Our company

Welcome to PrzyGoDa, your premier destination for exquisite floral arrangements and heartfelt gifts. With a passion for flowers and a commitment to exceptional customer service, PrzyGoDa has been spreading joy and beauty through the language of flowers since its establishment.
At PrzyGoDa, we believe that every occasion deserves to be celebrated with the perfect floral touch. Whether you're looking for a vibrant bouquet to brighten someone's day, a romantic arrangement to express your love, or elegant centerpieces for a special event, our talented team of floral designers is dedicated to creating stunning compositions that capture the essence of your emotions.
Since our inception, PrzyGoDa has fostered strong relationships with local flower growers, ensuring that we source only the freshest and highest-quality blooms for our customers. We take great pride in supporting sustainable practices and work closely with our suppliers to promote environmentally friendly and socially responsible approaches in the floral industry.

Delivery info

At PrzyGoDa, we understand the importance of timely and reliable delivery when it comes to spreading joy and making moments special. We strive to ensure that your floral arrangements and gifts are delivered with utmost care and efficiency, creating memorable experiences for both senders and recipients.
Delivery Options:
  1. Local Delivery: We offer local delivery services to our valued customers within a specified radius of our flower shop. Our dedicated delivery team takes pride in handling your precious orders with the utmost care and attention to detail.
  2. Same-Day Delivery: For those last-minute surprises or spontaneous gestures, PrzyGoDa offers same-day delivery. Simply place your order before our designated cutoff time (typically in the morning), and we will do our best to ensure your thoughtful gift reaches its destination on the same day.
  3. Nationwide Delivery: PrzyGoDa extends its services beyond our local area to cover nationwide delivery. Through our network of trusted delivery partners, we can deliver your floral arrangements and gifts to recipients located anywhere within the country. Please note that specific delivery timeframes may vary depending on the destination.
Delivery fees are determined based on the distance and complexity of the delivery. As you proceed with your online order or speak to our friendly staff, we will provide you with the exact delivery fee applicable to your chosen location.
We understand that certain deliveries may require special instructions or have unique circumstances. If you have any specific requirements or preferences regarding the delivery of your order, kindly communicate them to us during the ordering process. We will do our best to accommodate your requests and ensure a smooth delivery experience.

Loyalty programm

At PrzyGoDa, we believe in cherishing our valued customers and expressing our gratitude for their continued support. That's why we have introduced our exclusive Loyalty Program, designed to reward you for your loyalty and make your experience with us even more delightful.

Cash return

Integer id quam. Morbi mi. Quisque nisl felis, venenatis tristique, dignissim in, ultrices sit amet, augue. Proin sodales libero eget ante. Nulla quam. Aenean laoreet. Vestibulum nisi lectus, commodo ac, facilisis ac, ultricies eu, pede. Ut orci risus, accumsan porttitor, cursus quis, aliquet eget, justo. Sed pretium blandit orci. Ut eu diam at pede suscipit sodales. Aenean lectus elit, fermentum non, convallis id, sagittis at, neque. Nullam mauris orci, aliquet et, iaculis et, viverra vitae, ligula.
); };
